rules.description: Kinesis Freestyle2 MAC: Change power to left_control + left_option + left_shift + grave_accent_and_tilde
Kinesis Freestyle2 MAC: Change left_command + left_control + left_shift + 3 to left_command + left_shift + 5
Change left_control + left_shift + left_option + r to left_command + spacebar
Change left_control + left_shift + left_option + e to left_command + left_control + spacebar
Change page_up to left_control + left_arrow
Change page_down to left_control + right_arrow
Change home to left_command+left_control+spacebar
Change end to left_command+spacebar
Change spacebar if held down to left_command. (Post spacebar if pressed alone)
Change left_control+hjkl to arrow keys
Change spotlight to left_command+spacebar
Mouse Keys Mode v4 (rev 3)
Change caps_lock key to hyper (control+option+shift). (Post escape key when pressed alone)
left_command + right_command + o is mission_control
left_command + right_command + p is Alt + Tab
left_command + right_command + Escape is launchpad
left_command + right_command + u is enter or return
left_command + right_command + comma is left click
left_command + right_command + period is right click
left_command + right_command + up is mouse up (slow)
left_command + right_command + right is mouse right (slow)
left_command + right_command + down is mouse down (slow)
left_command + right_command + left is mouse left (slow)
left_command + right_command + left_shift + up is mouse up (fast)
left_command + right_command + left_shift + right is mouse right (fast)
left_command + right_command + left_shift + down is mouse down (fast)
left_command + right_command + left_shift + left is mouse left (fast)
page up is mouse scroll up
end is mouse scroll right
page down is mouse scroll down
home is mouse scroll left
left_command + right_command + semicolon is move mouse center
left_command + right_command + right_shift + i move mouse mid top left
left_command + right_command + right_shift + l is move mouse mid top right
left_command + right_command + right_shift + k is move mouse mid bottom right
left_command + right_command + right_shift + j is move mouse mid bottom left
left_command + right_command + right_shift + w is move mouse top left corner
left_command + right_command + right_shift + d is move mouse top right corner
left_command + right_command + right_shift + s is move mouse bottom right corner
left_command + right_command + right_shift + a is move mouse bottom left corner
Change left_control + left_shift + left_option + r to left_command + spacebar
Change left_control + left_shift + left_option + e to left_command + left_control + spacebar
Mouse Keys Mode v4 (rev 3)
Change caps_lock key to hyper (control+option+shift). (Post escape key when pressed alone)
